CODE COMPARATIVE TABLE - LEGISLATION
This table gives the location within this Code of those ordinances adopted since the 2002 Code, as updated through April 9, 2002, which are included herein. Ordinances not listed herein have been omitted as repealed, superseded or not of a general and permanent nature.
